pinMenuMessageLabel.origMessage: Pin the extension from puzzle menu above.
pinMenuMessageLabel.currentMessage: Bandika kiendelezi kutoka kwa menyu ya mafumbo hapo juu.

mainWelcomeHeading.origMessage: Extract text from any page/pdf on the internet
mainWelcomeHeading.currentMessage: Toa maandishi kutoka kwa ukurasa/pdf yoyote kwenye mtandao

littleInfoLabel.origMessage: Image taken for OCR (Optical Character Recognition).
littleInfoLabel.currentMessage: Picha iliyopigwa kwa OCR (Utambuaji wa Tabia ya Macho).

pdfDragInfoLabel.origMessage: Drag 'n' drop some files here, or click to select files.
pdfDragInfoLabel.currentMessage: Buruta 'n' dondosha baadhi ya faili hapa, au ubofye ili kuchagua faili.

littleInfoPdfLabel.origMessage: Pdf taken for OCR (Optical Character Recognition).
littleInfoPdfLabel.currentMessage: Pdf imechukuliwa kwa OCR (Utambuaji wa Tabia ya Macho).

extractTextFromImageLabel.currentMessage: Toa Maandishi kutoka kwa picha hii

uploadPdfLabel.origMessage: upload pdf to extract text from
uploadPdfLabel.currentMessage: pakia pdf ili kutoa maandishi kutoka

appDescription.origMessage: A Fast and simple document scanner app with high quality text output.
appDescription.currentMessage: Programu ya kuchanganua hati ya haraka na rahisi yenye maandishi ya hali ya juu.

subHeadOne.origMessage: Scan Image from your folder or Internet.
subHeadOne.currentMessage: Changanua Picha kutoka kwa folda yako au Mtandao.

subHeadOneDesc.origMessage: Do Image scan on any webpage [using our browser extenion] on the internet or uplaod your image on our website to get text using our best accuracy OCR technology.
subHeadOneDesc.currentMessage: Changanua Picha kwenye ukurasa wowote wa wavuti [kwa kutumia kiendelezi cha kivinjari chetu] kwenye mtandao au pakia picha yako kwenye tovuti yetu ili kupata maandishi kwa kutumia teknolojia yetu ya usahihi zaidi ya OCR.

subHeadTwoDesc.origMessage: Supports 100+ language and its variants. Scan document of any language and get Text using our Image to Text (OCR) app.
subHeadTwoDesc.currentMessage: Inaauni lugha 100+ na vibadala vyake. Changanua hati ya lugha yoyote na upate Maandishi kwa kutumia programu yetu ya Picha hadi Maandishi (OCR).

headF1Desc.origMessage: Click on the option "upload pdf to do OCR" from context menu to do Document scan on Pdfs and get Text.
headF1Desc.currentMessage: Bofya kwenye chaguo "pakia pdf kufanya OCR" kutoka kwa menyu ya muktadha kufanya uchanganuzi wa Hati kwenye Pdf na upate Maandishi.

headF2Desc.origMessage: Click on the extension icon from Screen cropper will appear. then Click on the + button, cropped screen will be scanned and you will get the Text.
headF2Desc.currentMessage: Bofya kwenye ikoni ya kiendelezi kutoka kwa Kipunguza skrini kitaonekana. kisha Bofya kwenye kitufe cha +, skrini iliyopunguzwa itachanganuliwa na utapata Maandishi.

headF3Desc.origMessage: Play the the OCR Text using our Text to Speech Technology. Translate OCR Text in any language you want.
headF3Desc.currentMessage: Cheza Maandishi ya OCR kwa kutumia Maandishi yetu hadi Teknolojia ya Kuzungumza. Tafsiri Maandishi ya OCR katika lugha yoyote unayotaka.
